wikipedia_page.main: Samuel James T. Taylor (17 September 1893 – 1973) was an English professional footballer, who played at inside forward for various clubs in the 1920s, including Huddersfield Town, Sheffield Wednesday and Southampton.

response: * Sam Taylor (director) (1895–1958), American film director and screenwriter
